entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Test.SetAfterUse_Throws fails #101015
  • Inherited cast causes inliner to give up #101014
  • Linux huge memory consumption in .NET 8 #101013
  • Use $HOME/.local/share/Microsoft/User-secrets instead of $HOME/.microsoft/usersecrets/ in unix-like environments. #101012
  • Native AoT-compiled application fails with TypeInitializationException in latest daily build for .NET 9 #101010
  • DATAS is slower than Workstation GC on binary tree benchmarks #101006
  • Error: "Undefined symbols for architecture arm64: _SSLClose" when building projects to iPad #101005
  • [API Proposal]: New method HashSet<T>.Add that replaces an existing element if found #101003
  • JIT: Optimize "x & cns == cns" pattern #101000
    Future

Closed

  • [wasm] System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteLargeToStream #101016
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json failing some large file tests #59678
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #96546
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][AOT] Vector256ByteShiftLeftTest - Cannot select: 0x55ee6da14cd0: v16i8 #87423
    9.0.0
  • Mono WASM PInvoke Table generation does not handle backticks #99241
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Blazor/AOT crashing with preview1 - `Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/aot-runtime.c:2443` #82481
    9.0.0
  • Regression in R2R compilation time #100995
  • Unable to Attach Visual Studio Debugger to Console App in SDK-style .NET Framework Project #100764
  • mono_os_mutex_destroy: pthread_mutex_destroy failed with "Device or resource busy" #99609
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics does not add my counter in the instrument in case of dotnet MAUI applicaiton when running android emulator #99822
  • AddIniFile Not found! #100992
  • Regex Capture gives IndexOutOfRangeException on `(?:){93}` #62094
    Future
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.FactorySha1Tests.HashAlgorithm_TransformBlockAndDispose_ConcurrentUseDoesNotCrashProcess fails #100983
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ArgumentNullException in SecurityIdentifier.CompareTo(null) #101002
    area-System.Security
  • Rework ProbabilisticMap character checks in SearchValues #101001
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Reduce frozen collection creation overheads for ignore-case with ASCII values #100998
    area-System.Collections

Merged

  • [wasm] Fix js string marshaling #100997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Search for seqpoints directly from jitinfo if it's not find on get_default_jit_mm #100978
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.5
  • Test to create ByRefLike instance through a generic parameter #101004
    test-enhancement, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Removing RUC from Default and Ambient attributes #100821
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Pass existing credscan suppression file to SDL scan #100976
    area-Infrastructure
  • Skip cleanup of eventpipe for mono to prevent crashes on shutdown #100938
    area-Tracing-mono, 9.0.0
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Fix erroneous readonly on a mutable struct #100996
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: verify full profile consistency after importation #100869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix NULL conversion warnings found in Alpine x64 Source-Build #100796
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix assert when using HashProviderCng concurrently #100989
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • Expose the `ConvertToIntegerNative` APIs #100993
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some volatile use on objects in corelib #100969
    area-Meta
  • [wasi] Debug missing wasmtime #100664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Use multi-reg load/store for DecodeFromUTF8 #100589
    arch-arm64, area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [mono][android] Disable Linux Bionic libraries test runs due to failures #100980
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Track sideness of arrOp in GetCheckedBoundArithInfo #100968
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fixed printing jump destinations in disassembler on release #100967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Channel.CreateUnboundedPrioritized #100550
    area-System.Threading.Channels

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works appears to be failing flakily #39960
  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Installing new sdk versions through dotnet #7549
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add `http` prefix when docker config detect a insecure registry #39840
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-13
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #8012

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34812.241 #73011

Updated

  • [feature request] Insight into what exceptions can reach a certain part of the code #71308
  • SyntaxTokenParser API Additions #73002

PullRequests

Created

  • Change all messages to pass back their checksum. Switch to callback … #73013
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add 'Make anonymous function static' feature #73012
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Move to collection exprs #73009
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to ToImmutableAndClear #73010
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use helper for creating KeyValuePairs. #73007
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Experiment with array creation. (part2) #73005
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused using #73006
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support custom task types in Minimal API endpoints #55118
  • Cannot bind custom class or record for HTTP request header with Minimal APIs #55117
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #55116
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #55115
  • DetectAmbiguousRoutes on RouteTableFactory doesn't scale well with large number of routes #55114
  • XmlSerializer does not support positional records and that leads to misleading response status. #55113
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates #55111
  • SQL Server distributed cache backend should perform "slide" UPDATE lazily #55109

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #55112
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, https #55110
  • blazor.web.js suddenly broken 8.0.100 #55063
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #55094
  • Embiggen ASP.NET Core development exception page text #54896
  • Improve wrapping of values on ASP.NET Core development exception page #54894

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix code tags in docs #54987
    area-security, 9.0-preview4
  • Improve the style for developer exception page #55042
    community-contribution, blog-candidate, area-middleware, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add HybridCache public API #55084
    feature-caching, area-runtime
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-routing
  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ImageButton can't adjust remote image size if size request #21819
  • Switches should have their own options to Color their Thumb and Tint for state On/Off #21817
  • [Spec, WiP] Provide better hooks for shell so users can better tune services and service scopes #21816
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Spec] Add better parameters for navigation args #21814
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Cannot run Debug build on iOS simulator #21811
  • Magic error #21810

Closed

  • Opacity bug on BoxView.Background #19926
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) #21818
    community ✨
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Android] Fixed box view properties #21322
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Remove old information from UITesting.md #21815
  • Add Links to Testing WIKI #21813

Updated

  • [macOS] Fix crash when setting window properties #21357
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • fix: Use AppContext.BaseDirectory instead of Environment.CurrentDirec… #21797
    community ✨
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong model creation for alternate keys using annotations and removed index #33531
  • How to check if LINQ query will be translated to one or multiple SQL queries/statements when using AsSplitQuery in application runtime, before executing query in database #33530

Closed

  • Execution Timeout Expired on Azure SQL Query with .NET 8 #33533
  • Using a certain GUID in a condition results Specified method is not supported. #33532

PullRequests

Updated

  • Pregenerate SQL for precompiled queries #33510
  • Fix parameter names for nested types in complex type equality #33527
  • Implement precompiled queries #33297

entry.content:
